review: Works well, but I’m my cases I’m always on it for one reason or another; septic, bladder/kidney infections, had a huge infection in my neck, that spread within 12 hours, couldn’t move my neck, right shoulder or arm, pneumonia, mrsa, staph, sci, infected bacterium port, etc. but I’m on it for at least a month at a time if not longer! Usually combined with different antibiotics tooOne lady on here was asking about demannose for bladder infections. Didn’t work for me.... it’s basically just sugar pills. Literally. Cystex works 10000000xs better! I take it at the first sign of pain, dark or cloudy urine... it is awesome & doesn’t have the red/orange staining properties like azo and other prescriptions like it like.
